source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learning Sketchup for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to use Sketchup quickly and easily
objectives_summary: use all of the essential Sketchup tools
draw basic architectural drawings like in the course project
show others that they just learned a new skill!

items.title: Character Design For Animation in Illustrator
items.headline: Design Memorable Character With a Strong Personality and Learn How to Prepare them for Animation
objectives_summary: You will be able to express personality with your characters, using poses with a strong line of action
And you will be able to prepare your designs to be rigged in an animation software for cut out animation

items.title: Blender for Complete and Total Beginners
items.headline: The absolute best starting point for learning 3D Modeling and Rendering in Blender, a completely free 3D application.
objectives_summary: The most fundamental concepts of 3D art and Blender.
All the essential tools for 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering.
Quick Start sections to quickly get you comfortable with the software.

items.title: GD & T and Stack-Up (Basic to Expert level)
items.headline: Basic to Advanced GD&T, Industrial level Problems, Stack-Up Analysis
objectives_summary: Advanced GD&T and Stack-Up
How GD&T is used in industries
Industrial examples of gd&t and stack-up

items.title: Sketching for Animators Who Can’t Draw
items.headline: The fun and easy way to learn how to draw for animators who can’t draw.
objectives_summary: Draw anything you want by using sketching techniques
Copy and duplicate any drawing using a technique of measuring proportions
Perfect your drawing skills by doing drawing exercises

items.title: Adobe After Effects 2021 Ultimate Course

visible_instructors.name: Learn Tech
visible_instructors.job_title: Web Development | Adobe | Google | Microsoft | Productivity
visible_instructors.title: Learn Tech Plus

items.headline: Everything you need to know about Adobe After Effects 2021
objectives_summary: Setup Account & Download Creative Cloud
Install Adobe After Effects CC 2021
Welcome Page

items.title: 3D Character Creation: Sculpting in Zbrush

visible_instructors.job_title: Dedicated to Transforming The Way Artists Create
visible_instructors.name: Victory3D
visible_instructors.title: Victory3D LLC

items.headline: Learn How to Sculpt Model a Detailed Full Body Character Today in Zbrush
objectives_summary: 23 lectures covering the most updated workflow of character creation in the 3D industry
Easy to follow step-by-step process
Dynamesh, Extract tool, Layers, Deformation, Panel Loops, Polygroup, Alphas, Subtools, Masking, Transformation tools plus more!

items.title: Unlocking the Unreal Engine Material Editor

visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Modeler, FX Artist, and Game Developer
visible_instructors.name: Timothy
visible_instructors.title: Timothy Trankle

items.headline: Learn how to combine textures, color data, and math to create your own custom AAA quality shaders
objectives_summary: Create practical materials based on real world uses for shaders within a game environment
Learn the techniques and design philosophy behind materials and shaders for AAA game development
Understand how to use color data in complex ways to create breathtaking effects for your materials

items.title: Create Animated Series for YouTube in CrazyTalk Animator 3
items.headline: Learn to use PSD Characters and Animate Each Episode 3X Faster
objectives_summary: Create an Animated Series
Animate each episode of your animated series 3X faster

items.title: The Ultimate Blender Low Poly Guide
items.headline: Create Some Awesome Low Poly Scenes!
objectives_summary: Students will learn the basics of 3D, low poly modeling and how to create low poly scenes!
Students will have a good understanding of modeling, adding materials and animating basics

items.title: The 2021 Blender Primer: 3D Modeling, Animation & Rendering

visible_instructors.job_title: Multimedia Engineer - Blender Foundation Certified Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Sebastián
visible_instructors.title: Sebastián Vargas Molano

items.headline: Blender from Absolute Beginner to Advanced. No need to have any previous experience, and we go in a lot of Depth!
objectives_summary: Understand The Blender Tool in it's entirety, and work with it fast and efficiently. Even if you have zero knowledge. (Yup, I'm not kidding here!)
Get a deep Understanding of the Math behind the Scenes of Blender with the Concept Videos.
Understand the Whole 3D Pipeline: Modeling, Animation and Rendering.

items.title: Learning SketchUp Pro 2015
items.headline: A step-by-step guide to 3D modeling using this powerful but accessible design tool.
objectives_summary: demonstrate the principles of drafting and 3D design
use SketchUp tools and features to create a modeled house or structure from scratch.

items.title: Learn the ART of Substance Painter

visible_instructors.name: Kevin
visible_instructors.job_title: Game Developer, Creative Director and Writer
visible_instructors.title: Kevin Oxland

items.headline: Learn to use the latest Substance Painter (and Designer) and become a professional game environment texture artist.
objectives_summary: Once you complete the course, you will be able to use Substance Painter confidently, and tetxure your models to a standard that is fit for game production.

items.title: 3DS Max Tutorial. Learn The Art of Modelling and Animation
items.headline: Become A 3DS Max Expert with 3ds Max Animation & Modeling Tutorials course. Over 18 Hours of Training

items.title: 2D Animation With No Drawing Skills in AE
items.headline: Learn to create and animate characters who express with body language in After Effects
objectives_summary: Design Simple Characters
Do Character Animation, expressing with body language

items.title: Get your Unity animation Game Ready with Moho Pro
items.headline: How to import 2D animation into Unity 3D and build a keyboard controlled walking character, in under 40 minutes!
objectives_summary: Import 2D animation into Unity
Create & Save a basic scene in Unity
Create a character using their animation
